skillVars.Basic Attack: Aalto fires up to 5 consecutive shots, dealing Aero DMG. Basic Attack 4 will spread the "Mist" forward, which lasts for 1.5s.
skillVars.Heavy Attack:
Aalto enters the aiming state for a more powerful shot.
The aimed shot fired after charging finishes deals Aero DMG.
skillVars.Mid-air Attack: Aalto consumes STA to perform consecutive shots at the target in mid-air, dealing Aero DMG.
skillVars.Dodge Counter: Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG.

skillVars.Mist Avatar: Casts "Mist" and 1 "Mist Avatar(s)" to taunt the surrounding targets. The avatars inherit a portion of Aalto's HP and generate 6 Mist Bullets around them, dealing Aero DMG.
skillVars.Mist Missiles: Deals Aero DMG, considered as Resonance Skill damage.

Forte Circuit.skillDesc: When Aalto passes through "Mist" or "Gate of Quandary", he enters "Mistcloak Dash".

skillVars.Mistcloak Dash:
- Movement speed increased;
- During this period, "Mist Drops" are continuously consumed, and for each 1 "Mist Drop" consumed, 1 Resonance Skill Mist Missile is generated.
skillVars.Mist Drops: Aalto can hold up to 6 "Mist Drops". When Basic Attack or Mid-air Attack passes through "Mist" and hits the target, 1 "Mist Drop" is recovered.

Resonance Liberation.skillDesc: Generate a "Gate of Quandary" in front, dealing Aero DMG. When bullets pass through the "Gate of Quandary", they deal increased DMG. "Gate of Quandary" lasts for 10s.

Intro Skill.skillDesc: Aaltos shows up out of thin air to perform rapid continuous shooting, dealing Aero DMG.

Outro Skill.skillDesc: The incoming character (or a character on a nearby team that activates an Outro Skill) has their Aero DMG Amplified by 23% for 14s or until they are switched off field.

skillVars.Basic Attack: Baizhi instructs You'tan to perform up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing Glacio DMG.
skillVars.Heavy Attack: Baizhi continuously consumes STA to command You'tan to attack enemies, dealing Glacio DMG. During Heavy Attack, Baizhi can command You'tan to move.
skillVars.Mid-air Attack: Baizhi consumes STA and summons You'Tan in mid-air to perform a Plunging Attack, dealing Glacio DMG.
skillVars.Dodge Counter: Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Glacio DMG.

Resonance Skill.skillDesc: Baizhi calls You'tan to attack the target, dealing Glacio DMG while immediately healing all characters on nearby teams.

skillVars.You'tan: A Remnant Creature that answers to Baizhi's mind and desires while sharing all her stats. You'tan goes back to Baizhi when Baizhi dodges.
skillVars.Forte Gauge: Concentration:
Baizhi can hold up to 4 "Concentrations".
Baizhi obtains "Concentration" for every Basic Attack on hit.

Resonance Liberation.skillDesc: Baizhi summons You'tan to heal all characters on nearby teams, generating 4 stacks of Remnant Entities.

skillVars.Remnant Entities: Remnant Entities follow the active team members. 1 stack of Remnant Entities is automatically consumed to attack the targets every 2.5s, dealing Glacio DMG on hit while healing the active character on a nearby team.

Intro Skill.skillDesc: Baizhi calls You'tan to perform 1 plunging attack, dealing Glacio DMG while healing all characters on a nearby team.

Outro Skill.skillDesc: Baizhi heals the incoming character (or a character on a nearby team that activates an Outro Skill) by 1.54% of her Max HP every 3s for 30s. The healed character(s) also have their All-Type DMG Amplified by 15% for 6s.

skillVars.Basic Attack: Perform up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing Electro DMG.
skillVars.Heavy Attack: Consume STA to attack the target, dealing Electro DMG.
skillVars.Mid-air Attack: Consume STA to perform a Mid-Air Plunging Attack, dealing Electro DMG.
skillVars.Dodge Counter: Using Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Electro DMG.

Resonance Skill.skillDesc:
Calcharo performs up to 3 consecutive attacks, dealing Electro DMG.
If Calcharo is switched off the field, or if Resonance Skill Extermination Order is not activated again in a while, this skill will enter Cooldown.
Resonance Skill Extermination Order does not interrupt Calcharo's Basic Attack Cycle.

skillVars.Heavy Attack: \"Mercy\":
When Calcharo has 3 "Cruelty", his Heavy Attack is replaced with Heavy Attack "Mercy".
When casting Heavy Attack "Mercy", Calcharo consumes 3 "Cruelty" to deal Electro DMG, considered as Heavy Attack damage, and recovers Resonance Energy and Concerto Energy.
skillVars.\"Cruelty\":
Calcharo can hold up to 3 "Cruelty". Under Resonance Liberation Deathblade Gear state, "Cruelty" cannot be acquired.
When Resonance Skill Extermination Order hits the target, gain 1 "Cruelty".
skillVars.Heavy Attack: \"Death Messenger\": When Calcharo has 5 "Killing Intent", his Basic Attack is replaced with Heavy Attack "Death Messenger". When casting Heavy Attack "Death Messenger", Calcharo consumes 5 "Killing Intent" to deal Electro DMG, considered as Resonance Liberation damage, and recovers Resonance Energy and Concerto Energy.
skillVars.\"Killing Intent\":
Under Resonance Liberation Deathblade Gear state, Calcharo's Forte Gauge is replaced with "Killing Intent", stacking up to 5.
When Basic Attack Hounds Roar hits the target, Calcharo gains 1 "Killing Intent".

Resonance Liberation.skillDesc: Calcharo attacks the target, dealing Electro DMG and enters Deathblade Gear state. After Deathblade Gear state ends, Calcharo's next Intro Skill is replaced with Intro Skill "Necessary Means", which deals Electro DMG, considered as Intro Skill damage.

skillVars.Basic Attack: Hounds Roar: Calcharo performs up to 5 consecutive attacks, dealing Electro DMG, considered as Basic Attack Damage.

Intro Skill.skillDesc: Attack the target, dealing Electro DMG.

Outro Skill.skillDesc: Calcharo summons Phantom to support the active Resonator, clearing the targets in front with a slash. The Phantom's attack deals Electro DMG equal to 195.98%+391.96% of Calcharo's ATK.

skillVars.Basic Attack: Chixia fires up to 4 consecutive shots, dealing Fusion DMG.
skillVars.Heavy Attack:
Chixia enters the aiming state for a more powerful shot.
The aimed shot fired after charging finishes deals Fusion DMG.
skillVars.Mid-air Attack: Chixia consumes STA to perform consecutive shots at the target in mid-air, dealing Fusion DMG.
skillVars.Dodge Counter: Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Fusion DMG.

Resonance Skill.skillDesc:
Chixia unleashes a flurry of shots, dealing Fusion DMG.

Whizzing Fight Spirit has 2 initial charges.

skillVars.Resonance Skill: Boom Boom: Deal Fusion DMG, considered as Resonance Skill damage.
skillVars.Thermobaric Bullets:
Chixia can hold up to 60 "Thermobaric Bullets".
Inherent Skill Scorching Magazine increases Max "Thermobaric Bullets" by 10.
Chixia obtains "Thermobaric Bullets" for every Normal Attack POW POW on hit.
Chixia obtains "Thermobaric Bullets" upon casting Intro Skill Grand Entrance and Resonance Skill Whizzing Fight Spirit.
